content: Weak-Kneed and Feeble. I've had this game for years, and hardly play it. Despite what the developer claims, his updates do absolutely nothing to improve the pathetic and inept AI that continues to fall for even the most obvious tricks and traps. This game does have good graphics, but unless you're 5 years old or less, the game itself will not present a challenge in the least.
Dont know yet. I purchased game via phone but when i tried dl it to tablet it asks me to buy it ? I already did

The last update broke functionality and developers response was shocking! Prior to the last update you had the ability to disable sounds from within the app. This ability is now broken & developers response was "either mute or turn down your system volume". Really!?!

I un-installed it one day later. As a huge fan of stratego this is a disappointment. 1. You can't save a starting layout 2. As others have said, the AI can repeat the same move infinitely but you cannot. This is one way the AI cheats. It cheats in ways i wont talk about here.This leads to constant stalemate which you can never end without giving the AI a fair trade. Even when you've cornered it. 3. The campaign is a joke. The levels designs showed some promise but the execution just isn't there
Still loving it
Only 2 campaigns. For real? What a joke. I paid for a full game and this is what you get? Don't get this
It has rorating prob.... While playing. My mobile rotates automatically again and again...
If you're a fan, this is for you. I've been playing this since I was 5... and I'm 65 now.
Love it. Wish image's were larger. Used to play a game like this can't remember the name
There is only one reason this game is getting such a bad review. The Computer doesn't have to obey the movement rules. If you fix that I'll fix this review.

Glitch and A.I So, I see what others are saying first on A.I never really going offensive. That is something I've noticed. Secondly, the main reason I chose to review, I noticed the A.I. can get away with going back and forth the same direction as many times as they want without having to alter. However, the player is told they can't do that. That needs to be fixed I thank those who created this as I do love Stratego, I grew up playing it and very much enjoyed the whole strategy of it
Pls add pass'n'play
Doesn't always start, black screen
It's a great game, i like it and i think you'll like it
REALLY laggy
It won't load, black screen of nothing. Don't waste your money. Such a shame I loved this game a kid

I'm a lifelong Stratego lover and this app is great! The graphics, the sounds, the music, and the statistics it keeps are all top-notch. The only improvement I'd make is in the movement of the Scouts: they have a jerky movement that makes it obvious they're Scouts (you'll probably only notice this after you've played several times). But if you like Stratego and want it on your phone, this app is for you.
Boring and slow paced...probably just like the original except you can't place your own pieces.
Great game. Wish it was a bit smarter however.

Its my favorite type of board game kinda like a mix between chess and poker. But the games is missing many aspects. It dosen't have a pass play mode (2 players on 1 device) and the settings are extremely limited.

Do not play if you aren't an idiot. Both campaigns done in 3 hours (100% game completion). The AI is an absolute joke, even on the hardest difficulty. The flags are always surrounded by bombs on the other side, so it's insanely easy to tell where it is and win. Wins aren't satisfying, losses make you think "why am I wasting my time with this?" Please someone tell me how to refund this garbage, this isn't even worth 99 cents.
Rigged

Game is nice, good graphs, interesting campaing mode...but, the AI is terrible! Even the hard mode it just keeps coming and going, never attacks or make clever movements. Sorry, but asking a refund. Would buy it again when AI gets improved.

It's a nice game but in campaign 2 it does not go further after winning the Paris game, it jumps back two games and is stuck there, so I have to repeat that game all the time. It is that part where you have to get the flag in a U shaped closed area on the right of the screen.
good, only wish MP ans SP were sold together
Try it if you're into strategy games, you won't be disappointed.
Just auto updated, opposition pieces move in a 'jerky' and rapid motion. This annoying. Updates should make the experience better.
replyContent: Hi Paul, Thanks for your feedback.

content: Most achievements don't work. You get within one but can never actuall get them. If you don't care about those is fun game.
Can't run the game on Note 9 after the latest update
fantastic!!
I deleted, reinstalled with update and everything is fine. Thank you.
replyContent: Hi, Do you update the game to the latest version of our game?

content: Amazing but needs to have more stuff to do. I wish the developer would combine single and multiplayer for the same price instead of having 2 different games.
replyContent: Thanks.

content: computer movements are really dumb. It's too easy to win on even the hardest setting

content: Awesome. would love more campaigns.

content: It didn't even open the game

content: It would be a lot cooler if it allowed me to restore my progress from my last phone...

content: Love it I won 100 games in a row w/o losing. That's not right. It starting kicking me out and I need to repurchase I guess

content: Game could be good but the computer AI knows exactly what my troops are. I have had a few games of a 9 reeking havick on my troops and specifically circling and missing bombs. Or I've had tens go completely around my strategically placed spy or not attack my bait. Need to fix the AIs xray vision, also add an undo button
replyContent: Hi Evan thanks fr your feedback. AI update needed on the game. Next version on AI update will be available as soon as possible. Have a nice time.

content: The AI has a tendency to just move pieces back and forth. And, they can have moving pieces that turn into a bomb before they turn into a different piece... boo.
replyContent: Hi, prevent AI repetitive movements behavior is gonna added as soon as possible. Thanks for your feedback.

content: The only thing that makes the AI difficult on 3 stars is that they automatically know when to use their scout against your 10. Without any way of knowing other than the AI being able to see my unit numbers without them ever being revealed.
replyContent: Hi Brandon, thanks for your feedback. We will work on AI and update as soon as possible. Great changes are on the way. keep in touch.

content: It is a good app to learn how to play the board game. The computer definitely cheats on the highest difficulty and knows what your pieces are, although has still not won a game against me. Worth it for a while, but the silly and cheaty AI will annoy you after a while. Edit - nah I have to only give it 2. Computer player really cheats a lot.
replyContent: Hi Paul, AI update is on our to-do list. Thanks for your feedback.

content: Awesome Game!
The AI is kinda lame, they REFUSE to make an attack or risk 90% of the time
Addicting. I want more campaigns

Game play is decent but there is no undo.  It is extremely easy to touch the wrong spot by mistake and unintentionally move a piece.  Moving pieces is not intuitive nor natural.  I play solo only.  It is really a pain to keep telling it to not spy on my activity.  Deny is deny forever.

The other comments are not true. Like how the game moves pieces that you did not order, this is because you are suposed to drag not click. Others say that the game cheats by knowing all your pieces, this may be true for the campaign but so what, you know the AI'S pieces anyway. The regular battles do not cheat tho the AI either guesses rembers the uncovered ones or sees you move to determine what rank your piece is.Now the final complaint I saw was the price of the game, the game cost money and in the game as well to unlock more levels ($0.99). This cost money but if you are a stratego pro like me that wants to challenge the best stratego players, just suck it up and buy this cause its one of the smartest stratego AI I have ever seen. And a MEASAGE to the PRODUCERS make the game free or at least the multiplayer game so more people can acual y get the game.
The "good old dependable" board game made for phone and tablet; thank you!
I hate this game, not like Stratego
replyContent: Hi Dominic, we gonna put great effort on this game and get your attention back. Please don't hate our game. That's will be great for our team to take much more care of your problems. Thanks for your feedback.

content: At least three achievements are broken. I almost have diffuse 100 bombs but the 50 one won't register still. Also the retry missions 10 times is broke and 6 bombs in one game.
Pieces never engage, just move around forcing you to move.

Seems ok. The new art style is pretty dumb though. I'm glad you can go back to the old classic one because at least those were correct Napoleonic military units and looked cool. The new style is a nonsense mix of 18th century bullshit.
Before Chess, There was STRATEGO!!!
The download was way to large. I uninstalled all apps to the bare essentials and it still wouldn't install.

AI knows exactly where your flag is everytime. Tested it and didnt move one piece to defend and miner, on 3 separate occasions, went straight for the bombs and flag. AI never attacks and or allows you to trap their marshal. Very poor game
I think the ai cheats...always seems to know which one to run away from
Love the animation!

Looks awesome... But the AI seems to just move back and forth a lot waiting for you to make all the moves.  Also I'll try clicking other pieces to move and it either moves the piece in the wrong direction or moves the last piece I moved in directions I didn't even touch! I've had to restart many games because of that. Very frustrating.
Unresponsive touch when moving pieces.
It took my money and installed to my samsung captivate, running gingerbread. However, apparently it isn't supported on my hardware.
Haven't played this in more than 30 years. Thanks for writing!

Going to echo the most common true  complaints.  1) You cant configure your own layout like in the real board game.   2) AI sux, no offense and knows where your top pieces are. 3) You cant play against a friend.

I remember playing this when I was a kid and I remember being able to choose where to put the pieces but this app won't let me but that is the only problem I have with this app, other than that this app is great

I have made a new version of stratego and several other games...called Kingdom and Existence. - I Will not acknoledge 10 to 1 style, only 1 to 10 for stratego. The ethics of the games truth and wisdoms discernment is to undertake the responsibility and actually not to allow even 1 fatality while playing stratego on either side should in effort instill play relection sometimes up to 1 week; while procuring and realizing the developmental necessiry. Then sometimes play and practice paradigms truth continuum.

The campaign was OK but real quick. The single player AI seems to know what your pieces are, which invalidates the whole game. Don't even think of wasting you money on the multiplayer version. There are so few downloads of it probably no one even pays.
Uses wifi and u cant set up pieces but u get what u pay 4 lol
The one thing about this game is you can play offline against the A1 which I prefer but there are better free games of similar mode available on Google Play Store.

The game plays well, mostly, but... you must get over the initial shock of the cartoon-y artwork on the pieces and the new rectangular shapes.  If you can, then it's okay.  The one serious flaw in this game is that the Two Squares movement rule is not programmed correctly.  When you have a piece trapped it gives the evader FOUR MOVES!!  Needless to say, this is a downer.  Also the message is wrong that uses the phrase, "more than four moves".  It should be "more than three moves".
The new version works! WOO-HOO! My favorite game all over again! Well done, gentlemen!
replyContent:
Hello Wayne,
We released a new version that should solve this problem!
Can you please check, let us know and update your review?
Thanks!

content: Great game

I like the way the game looks, but the campaign mode is super short and not worth the money. If you want move levels (15) get ready to dish out another $1.99, good game just not totally worth it. If it was free to begin with I would have spent the money for extra levels...
So far so good, no problems so far. Gameplay done right, nice graphics and sound.

I want to buy Stratego, but why pay for a game that wants you to buy "in app purchases"? This just seems weird. Stratego is a board game and I see no reason for any "in app purchases", and I also can't find any information about it in the describing text.  I wish Google could offered a way just to hide/disable all "in app purchases" applications. Hopefully such apps won't exist in a few years.
I like the game but half the reason I got it was to be able to play against my friends in this device. So if you guys could create a way to have 2 player on one device I would greatly appreciate it.
Quite often crashing on my Samsung pro 10.1 tab. Very disappointing, fixed now!

content: Olde skool board game I loved when I was a kid, now the app I love today! I'd like to thank all involved for the update that seems to have cleared the bug that had it freezing up. The AI just moves same pieces back and forth all day until you do somthing. Its very boring and seems one sided. I love the original board game and this looks and could have been very nice. The AI makes this game worthless...

content: I love it

This is a nice game for wiling the time away! Nice graphics and quick to get your head around.  The only grumps I have are occasional crashes and that even on top skill level the computer doesn't present much of a challenge.... Doesn't seem to anticipate very well or take the initiative.... So you won't loose very many games once you've got the rules in your head!!   UPDATE.....Unfortunately has started crashing halfway through every game.... This despite 3 reinstalls.. Please fix this.

This game is BS. It cheats. It knows exactly where your pieces are and it knows exactly what pieces to avoid until it has favorable conditions to make a move. There's not a human opponent anywhere on earth that is as conspicuously psychic as the computer opponent in this game. It knows EXACTLY where my Marshall is at all times. THIS GAME SUCKS.
I have always loved the game, but this app is nerve racking to say the least. It's keeps freezing, and then states that stratego has stopped. This needs to be fixed.
I cant finish a level without crashing
Game knows where your pieces are and avoids them.
.99 add on campaign crashes on fourth mission every single time. Love the game, wish they could fix this.
Started great, really enjoyed playing the game. After a day of having the game, it crashes all of the time.  Apparently I'm not the only one. Needs to be updated. Don't buy!

Developer had a mishap with single/multiplayer versions of this game. Their support came through and helped me with in a polite and timely manner. I think taking responsibility for its customers deserves some recognition these days.   Oh, and the game is good.

This game has great polish and design, but the continual crashing makes it unplayable. As a software engineer I don't understand why the developer isn't taking care of this. On a Nexus 9, crashing occurs after about 10 minutes of game play.  Given this level of reproducibility it should be easy to find the memory leak or other root cause.
Would be improved by adding optional rule variations like rescue, one-time bombs, silent defence and attacker advantage. Also needs to be more battery efficient.
Make more campaigns!!! :)
Don't spend your money till they fix, can't finish a match.

content: PLEASE IMPROVE THE A. I. ITS NEVER SMART AND IT IT NEVER EVER GOES OFFENSE PLEASE MAKE THE A. I. MORE AGRESSIVE

Love it
It would be better if it was multi player with freinds

Stratego is my favorite board game and strategy game of all time. I fell in love with it as a kid and still love playing it as an adult. I was excited to find the ap and couldn't wait to play. Unfortunately, the basic campaign is free but anything more comes with a fee. That should be disclosed before purchasing the ap itself. The bigger issue is that the ap keeps freezing on me during game play. I have not finished my last 7+ games due to the ap freezing. So frustrating!!! . . . Update: game still freezes.

I put it on level 3 difficulty for somewhat of a challenge and it just cheats you. Ex. Going around bombs , knowing where the spy is everytime without it moving. Level 1 and 2 must be for children, not even remotely fu n. Level 3 is the opponent can see all your pieces. NEXT TIME GET A GUN AND MASK CAUSE IVE BEEN ROBBED!!!!!

Boy, what a solid well made game, this sure brings back memories, but now I can play the A.I. instead of a human adversary. Includes a tutorial for a refresher or in case you're new to this game, also has different difficulty settings.
Worth the money 100% Can't wait for more. Works well on my phone and tablet
Great game and well worth the purchase. Looking forward to new content. Like others have said it is a bit easy at times but excellent none the less cheers and keep up the great work.
Game keeps crashing since downloading waterloo.  AI is a little better since update, but not nearly good enough for a challenge

content: The game seems quite nice but I'm not sure why I have to pay twice to have it on my phone and tablet since both of them are synchronized with the same Play Store account.

It's important to my strategy to be able to see how many of each piece my opponent has lost. Both the board game and the online version do this, but not this single player version. If this feature is implemented (or if it exists and I haven't found it) I'll change my review. EDIT: there's a skull button to see the graveyard, but it sometimes disappears. In order to see it I had to change my piece style twice.
replyContent:
Hi Anschel, 
On mobile phones there is a small skull in the top right corner during battle and quick battle.
Press that and you will see the 'Graveyard' that shows the pieces you and your opponent lost.
On tablets this is on screen all the time.

Please keep in mind that during Campaign mode this feature is turned off!
As it spoils the surprise :)
